publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3399 John Wilson: Pressurised Area Status in North Lanarkshire—That the Parliament welcomes the decision by the Scottish Government to grant pressurised area status to the North Lanarkshire Council areas of Cumbernauld and Moodiesburn, which enables the council to suspend the right to buy to tenants who started their tenancies after 30 September 2002, and considers that the action by the government and council could stop the decline of housing stock lost through right to buy and ensure that the council can maintain control over existing housing stock. Supported by: Christina McKelvie*, Bill Kidd*, Jim Tolson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-3399 Pressurised Area Status in North Lanarkshire (lodged on 6 February 2009) Alex Neil*, Alasdair Allan*, Brian Adam*
S3M-3399# Pressurised Area Status in North Lanarkshire (lodged on 6 February 2009) Aileen Campbell*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-3399# Pressurised Area Status in North Lanarkshire (lodged on 6 February 2009) Gil Paterson*, Rob Gibson*, Sandra White*
S3M-3399# Pressurised Area Status in North Lanarkshire (lodged on 6 February 2009) Robin Harper*, Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-3399# Pressurised Area Status in North Lanarkshire (lodged on 6 February 2009) Dave Thompson*

S3M-3399# John Wilson: Pressurised Area Status in North Lanarkshire—That the Parliament welcomes the decision by the Scottish Government to grant pressurised area status to the North Lanarkshire Council areas of Cumbernauld and Moodiesburn, which enables the council to suspend the right to buy to tenants who started their tenancies after 30 September 2002, and considers that the action by the government and council could stop the decline of housing stock lost through right to buy and ensure that the council can maintain control over existing housing stock. Supported by: Christina McKelvie, Bill Kidd, Jim Tolson, Jamie Hepburn, Stuart McMillan, Alex Neil, Alasdair Allan, Brian Adam, Aileen Campbell, Michael Matheson, Gil Paterson, Rob Gibson, Sandra White, Robin Harper, Hugh O’Donnell, Dave Thompson Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-3399# Pressurised Area Status in North Lanarkshire (lodged on 6 February 2009) Elaine Smith* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
